solution_line_template: The number of yellow blocks is {red_blocks} blocks + {yellow_more_than_red} blocks = <<{red_blocks}+{yellow_more_than_red}={yellow_blocks}>>{yellow_blocks} blocks.
The number of blue blocks is {red_blocks} blocks + {blue_more_than_red} blocks = <<{red_blocks}+{blue_more_than_red}={blue_blocks}>>{blue_blocks} blocks.

The total number of red, yellow, and blue blocks is {red_blocks} blocks + {yellow_blocks} blocks + {blue_blocks} blocks = <<{red_blocks}+{yellow_blocks}+{blue_blocks}={total_blocks}>>{total_blocks} blocks.
